artist: Artist: Kasamatsu Shirō; Publisher: Watanabe Shōzaburō
description: very large hanging red lantern with black characters on front, with a smaller brown lantern with gold characters in front of it; men in Western dress (overcoats and fedora hats) and women in kimonos on steps in foreground
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
text: Original 1934 but here missing the date.
title: Great lantern at Asakusa Kannondō
